nodes.text: Growzers were a species of domesticated animals present on the planet Celwis. Lakphro and his family owned a group of growzers used to raise and herd their Yubals. One of their growzers was named Slobber, who was trained to come at the sound of a jacket sealer. Growzers were also referenced in multiple turns of phrase, including "son of a growzer" and "Some days you're the growzer, and some days you're the growzer's son."
